thread.title: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in memoir adaptation The Glass Castle - Movies
thread.title_full: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in memoir adaptation The Glass Castle - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in memoir adaptation The Glass Castle - Movies
text: Brie Larson is in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in the movie adaptation of The Glass Castle.Hunger Games actress Jennifer Lawrence was originally tipped to star in and produce the film, but has now pulled out, according to The Wrap. © PA Images / Jack Plunckett/AP The Glass Castle is based on the 2005 memoir of the same name by Jeannette Walls. The book revolves around her dysfunctional upbringing with an artist mother and alcoholic father.Larson could potentially take on the role of Jeannette, where she would appear alongside Claire Danes and Mark Ruffalo, who have signed on to play Rose Mary and Rex Walls. © A24 Films She would also be teaming up with her Short Term 12 director Destin Cretton, who will be directing the project.Larson can next be seen in the adaptation of Room, which has just nabbed the People's Choice Award at Toronto International Film Festival.Watch the trailer for Room below:
